name: Trouble with Tribbles
description:
Trouble with Tribbles

Tribbles are entering the ships systems, interfering with their functions and eating any edible bits. We must get them off the ship before they do too much damage. In order to use the transporters efficiently the Captain has ordered us to only beam them when 2 or more are together.

Trouble with Tribbles is an action puzzle game similar to the classic game collapse. There are two modes you can play, the classic mode and a new mode "Clear the Level".
